altTitle: 王妃になる予定でしたが、偽聖女の汚名を着せられたので逃亡したら、皇太子に溺愛されました。そちらもどうぞお幸せに。
I Was Supposed to Become Queen, but I Had to Flee Once I Was Accused of Being a Fake Saint. Even so, the Crown Prince Adored Me, so I Hope For Their Happiness.
title: Ouhi ni Naru Yotei Deshitaga, Niseseijo no Omei wo Kiseraretanode Toubou Shitara, Koutaishi ni Dekiai Saremashita. Sochira mo Douzo Oshiawase ni.
